Core:PCProperties.Core:Property:
(\{ (\{ "+\int\ create; \$(miki-web-folder) = this.\"config:miki-web-folder\"\; \$server = \$\{Data:info\}.server; create = FALSE; \if\ (!\$web) \{ \$web = \"main\"\; \$page = \"index_\"\; \} \if\ (!\$page) \{ \$page = \"index_\"\; \} \if\ (\$action == \"create\"\) \{ /* Special case; we need to resolve the page here, and possibly even change the web. */\ \$page = replace_strings(\$page, \"!-USC!\"\, \"_\"\); \if\ (contains(\$page, \".\"\)) \{ /* Got a web reference. */\ \string\ *s; s = \explode\(\$page, \".\"\); \$web = s[0]; \$page = s[1]; \} /* Flag creation. */\ create = TRUE; /* And set action to edit. */\ \$action = \"edit\"\; \} \$webob = Obj(\$(miki-web-folder) + \$web); \if\ (\$webob.\"web-is\"\) \$webob = \$webob.\"web-is\"\; \if\ (!\$webob) \{ ::set_\error\(\$\error\: \"web_not_found\"\); \} \if\ (!contains(\$page, \"_\"\)) \$page = \$page + \"_\"\; \if\ (\$action == \"edit\"\ \&\& \$webob.\"web-readonly\"\) \{ ::set_\error\(\$\error\: \"read_only_web\"\); \} \$pagedata = Get(\$webob, \"page:\"\ + \$page); \if\ (!\$pagedata) \{ \if\ (create) \{ /* Marked for creation. */\ \$pagedata = \"\"\; \} \else\ \{ \$which = \$page; \$whichweb = \$web; ::set_\error\(\$\error\: \"page_not_found\"\); \$pagedata = Get(\$webob, \"page:\"\ + \$page); \} \} \if\ (!\$action) \{ \$action = \"view\"\; \} /* Check lock. */\ \if\ (\$udat.\"miki:lock\"\) \{ /* There's a lock. Unlock it. */\ \object\ web; \string\ page; web = \$udat.\"miki:lockweb\"\; page = \$udat.\"miki:lock\"\; \if\ (Get(web, \"lock:\"\ + page) == \$uname) \{ Set(web, \"lock:\"\ + page, 
il\); Set(web, \"lock-stamp:\"\ + page, 
il\); \$udat.\"miki:lockweb\"\ = 
il\; \$udat.\"miki:lock\"\ = 
il\; \} \} \if\ (\$action == \"edit\"\ \&\& !\$confirm_edit) \{ /* Check if the page is currently locked. */\ \string\ lock; \int\ locked_when; lock = Get(\$webob, \"lock:\"\ + \$page); locked_when = \Int\(Get(\$webob, \"lock-stamp:\"\ + \$page)); \if\ (lock \&\& locked_when + 86400 \> 	ime\() \&\& lock != \$uname) \{ \$action = \"edit-locked\"\; \$lockedby = lock; \$lockedwhen = short_	ime\(locked_when); \} \else\ \{ /* Page is not locked. Lock it. */\ Set(\$webob, \"lock:\"\ + \$page, \$uname); Set(\$webob, \"lock-stamp:\"\ + \$page, 	ime\()); \$udat.\"miki:lockweb\"\ = \$webob; \$udat.\"miki:lock\"\ = \$page; \} \} \$jsinit = Get(this, \"jsinit:\"\ + \$action); \if\ (!\$jsinit) \$jsinit = \"function init_page() \{\}\"\; \$headextra = Get(this, \"head:\"\ + \$action); \$(miki-location) = \$server + \" \→ \"\ + \$web + \" \→ \"\ + replace_strings(\$page, \"_\"\, \" \"\); \$(miki-wrapation) = \$server + \" \→ [\"\ + \$web + \".index_\|\"\ + \$web + \"] \→ \<span class='quickgoto' onclick='javascript:quickgoto(this)'\>\"\ + replace_strings(\$page, \"_\"\, \" \"\) + \"\</span\>\"\; \if\ (\$action == \"view\"\ \|\| \$action == \"diffs\"\) \{ \$(mikipage-rev) = \Int\(Get(\$webob, \"rev:\"\ + \$page)); \$(mikipage-diff) = Get(\$webob, \"diff:\"\ + \$page + \":\"\ + \$(mikipage-rev)); \$(mikipage-diffx) = \sizeof\(Arr(\$(mikipage-diff))); \if\ (\$(mikipage-diffx) \> 2) \{ \$(mikipage-author) = \$(mikipage-diff)[\$(mikipage-diffx)-1]; \$(mikipage-stamp) = \$(mikipage-diff)[\$(mikipage-diffx)-2]; \if\ (	ypeof\(\$(mikipage-stamp)) == T_\INT\) \$(mikipage-date) = short_	ime\(\$(mikipage-stamp)); \$(mikipage-author) = \"[main.user_\"\ + \$(mikipage-author) + \"\|\"\ + \$(mikipage-author) + \"]\"\; \} \else\ \{ \$(mikipage-author) = \"nobody\"\; \$(mikipage-stamp) = 0; \$(mikipage-date) = \"sometime\"\; \} \} " \}), 1134012103, "tunk_bodin" \})

(\{ (\{ "-# Some constants to use in our form. @colors=qw/aqua black blue fuschia gray green lime maroon navy olive purple red silver teal white yellow/; @sizes=(\\"\<default\>\\",1..7); # recover the \\"preferences\\" cookie. %preferences = cookie('preferences'); # If the user wants to change the background color or her # name, they will appear among our CGI parameters. foreach ('text','background','name','size') \{ \$preferences\{\$_\} = param(\$_) \|\| \$preferences\{\$_\}; \} # Set some defaults \$preferences\{'background'\} = \$preferences\{'background'\} \|\| 'silver'; \$preferences\{'text'\} = \$preferences\{'text'\} \|\| 'black'; # Refresh the cookie so that it doesn't expire. This also # makes any changes the user made permanent. \$the_cookie = cookie(-name=\>'preferences', \\t\\t\\t -value=\>\\\\%preferences, \\t\\t\\t -expires=\>'+30d'); print header(-cookie=\>\$the_cookie); # Adjust the title to incorporate the user's name, if provided. \$title = \$preferences\{'name'\} ? \\"Welcome back, \$preferences\{name\}!\\" : \\"Customizable Page\\"; # Create the HTML page. We use several of Netscape's # extended tags to control the background color and the # font size. It's safe to use Netscape features here because # cookies don't work anywhere else anyway. print start_html(-title=\>\$title, \\t\\t -bgcolor=\>\$preferences\{'background'\}, \\t\\t -text=\>\$preferences\{'text'\} \\t\\t ); print basefont(\{SIZE=\>\$preferences\{size\}\}) if \$preferences\{'size'\} \> 0; print h1(\$title),\<\<END; You can change the appearance of this page by submitting the fill-out form below. If you return to this page any time within 30 days, your preferences will be restored. END ; # Create the form print hr(), start_form, \\"Your first name: \\", textfield(-name=\>'name', \\t -default=\>\$preferences\{'name'\}, \\t -size=\>30),br, table( \\t TR( \\t td(\\"Preferred\\"), \\t td(\\"Page color:\\"), \\t td(popup_menu(-name=\>'background', \\t\\t\\t -values=\>\\\\@colors, \\t\\t\\t -default=\>\$preferences\{'background'\}) \\t\\t), \\t ), \\t TR( \\t td(''), \\t td(\\"Text color:\\"), \\t td(popup_menu(-name=\>'text', \\t\\t\\t -values=\>\\\\@colors, \\t\\t\\t -default=\>\$preferences\{'text'\}) \\t\\t) \\t ), \\t TR( \\t td(''), \\t td(\\"Font size:\\"), \\t td(popup_menu(-name=\>'size', \\t\\t\\t -values=\>\\\\@sizes, \\t\\t\\t -default=\>\$preferences\{'size'\}) \\t\\t) \\t ) \\t ), submit(-label=\>'Set preferences'), hr; \\t print a(\{HREF=\>\\"/\\"\},'Go to the home page'); print end_html; ", "+if (!\$query-\>param) \{ print \\"\<H1\>Ask your Question\</H1\>\\\\n\\"; print \$query-\>startform(-target=\>'_new'); print \\"What's your name? \\",\$query-\>textfield('name'); print \\"\<P\>What's the combination?\<P\>\\", \$query-\>checkbox_group(-name=\>'words', \\t\\t\\t -values=\>['eenie','meenie','minie','moe'], \\t\\t\\t -defaults=\>['eenie','moe']); print \\"\<P\>What's your favorite color? \\", \$query-\>popup_menu(-name=\>'color', \\t\\t -values=\>['red','green','blue','chartreuse']), \\"\<P\>\\"; print \$query-\>submit; print \$query-\>endform; \} else \{ print \\"\<H1\>And the Answer is...\</H1\>\\\\n\\"; print \\"Your name is \<EM\>\\",\$query-\>param(name),\\"\</EM\>\\\\n\\"; print \\"\<P\>The keywords are: \<EM\>\\",join(\\", \\",\$query-\>param(words)),\\"\</EM\>\\\\n\\"; print \\"\<P\>Your favorite color is \<EM\>\\",\$query-\>param(color),\\"\</EM\>\\\\n\\"; \} " \}), 1134021758, "tunk_bodin" \})

(\{ (\{ "-\int\ create; \$(miki-web-folder) = this.\"config:miki-web-folder\"\; \$server = \$\{Data:info\}.server; create = FALSE; \if\ (!\$web) \{ \$web = \"main\"\; \$page = \"index_\"\; \} \if\ (!\$page) \{ \$page = \"index_\"\; \} \if\ (\$action == \"create\"\) \{ /* Special case; we need to resolve the page here, and possibly even change the web. */\ \$page = replace_strings(\$page, \"!-USC!\"\, \"_\"\); \if\ (contains(\$page, \".\"\)) \{ /* Got a web reference. */\ \string\ *s; s = \explode\(\$page, \".\"\); \$web = s[0]; \$page = s[1]; \} /* Flag creation. */\ create = TRUE; /* And set action to edit. */\ \$action = \"edit\"\; \} \$webob = Obj(\$(miki-web-folder) + \$web); \if\ (\$webob.\"web-is\"\) \$webob = \$webob.\"web-is\"\; \if\ (!\$webob) \{ ::set_\error\(\$\error\: \"web_not_found\"\); \} \if\ (!contains(\$page, \"_\"\)) \$page = \$page + \"_\"\; \if\ (\$action == \"edit\"\ \&\& \$webob.\"web-readonly\"\) \{ ::set_\error\(\$\error\: \"read_only_web\"\); \} \$pagedata = Get(\$webob, \"page:\"\ + \$page); \if\ (!\$pagedata) \{ \if\ (create) \{ /* Marked for creation. */\ \$pagedata = \"\"\; \} \else\ \{ \$which = \$page; \$whichweb = \$web; ::set_\error\(\$\error\: \"page_not_found\"\); \$pagedata = Get(\$webob, \"page:\"\ + \$page); \} \} \if\ (!\$action) \{ \$action = \"view\"\; \} /* Check lock. */\ \if\ (\$udat.\"miki:lock\"\) \{ /* There's a lock. Unlock it. */\ \object\ web; \string\ page; web = \$udat.\"miki:lockweb\"\; page = \$udat.\"miki:lock\"\; \if\ (Get(web, \"lock:\"\ + page) == \$uname) \{ Set(web, \"lock:\"\ + page, 
il\); Set(web, \"lock-stamp:\"\ + page, 
il\); \$udat.\"miki:lockweb\"\ = 
il\; \$udat.\"miki:lock\"\ = 
il\; \} \} \if\ (\$action == \"edit\"\ \&\& !\$confirm_edit) \{ /* Check if the page is currently locked. */\ \string\ lock; \int\ locked_when; lock = Get(\$webob, \"lock:\"\ + \$page); locked_when = \Int\(Get(\$webob, \"lock-stamp:\"\ + \$page)); \if\ (lock \&\& locked_when + 86400 \> 	ime\() \&\& lock != \$uname) \{ \$action = \"edit-locked\"\; \$lockedby = lock; \$lockedwhen = short_	ime\(locked_when); \} \else\ \{ /* Page is not locked. Lock it. */\ Set(\$webob, \"lock:\"\ + \$page, \$uname); Set(\$webob, \"lock-stamp:\"\ + \$page, 	ime\()); \$udat.\"miki:lockweb\"\ = \$webob; \$udat.\"miki:lock\"\ = \$page; \} \} \$jsinit = Get(this, \"jsinit:\"\ + \$action); \if\ (!\$jsinit) \$jsinit = \"function init_page() \{\}\"\; \$headextra = Get(this, \"head:\"\ + \$action); \$(miki-location) = \$server + \" \→ \"\ + \$web + \" \→ \"\ + replace_strings(\$page, \"_\"\, \" \"\); \$(miki-wrapation) = \$server + \" \→ [\"\ + \$web + \".index_\|\"\ + \$web + \"] \→ \<span class='quickgoto' onclick='javascript:quickgoto(this)'\>\"\ + replace_strings(\$page, \"_\"\, \" \"\) + \"\</span\>\"\; \if\ (\$action == \"view\"\ \|\| \$action == \"diffs\"\) \{ \$(mikipage-rev) = \Int\(Get(\$webob, \"rev:\"\ + \$page)); \$(mikipage-diff) = Get(\$webob, \"diff:\"\ + \$page + \":\"\ + \$(mikipage-rev)); \$(mikipage-diffx) = \sizeof\(Arr(\$(mikipage-diff))); \if\ (\$(mikipage-diffx) \> 2) \{ \$(mikipage-author) = \$(mikipage-diff)[\$(mikipage-diffx)-1]; \$(mikipage-stamp) = \$(mikipage-diff)[\$(mikipage-diffx)-2]; \if\ (	ypeof\(\$(mikipage-stamp)) == T_\INT\) \$(mikipage-date) = short_	ime\(\$(mikipage-stamp)); \$(mikipage-author) = \"[main.user_\"\ + \$(mikipage-author) + \"\|\"\ + \$(mikipage-author) + \"]\"\; \} \else\ \{ \$(mikipage-author) = \"nobody\"\; \$(mikipage-stamp) = 0; \$(mikipage-date) = \"sometime\"\; \} \} ", "+\X[M] int\ create; \$(miki-web-folder) = this.\"config:miki-web-folder\"\; \$server = \$\{Data:info\}.server; create = FALSE; \if\ (!\$web) \{ \$web = \"main\"\; \$page = \"index_\"\; \} \if\ (!\$page) \{ \$page = \"index_\"\; \} \if\ (\$action == \"create\"\) \{ /* Special case; we need to resolve the page here, and possibly even change the web. */\ \$page = replace_strings(\$page, \"!-USC!\"\, \"_\"\); \if\ (contains(\$page, \".\"\)) \{ /* Got a web reference. */\ \string\ *s; s = \explode\(\$page, \".\"\); \$web = s[0]; \$page = s[1]; \} /* Flag creation. */\ create = TRUE; /* And set action to edit. */\ \$action = \"edit\"\; \if\ (\$action == \"edit\"\ \&\& \$webob.\"web-readonly\"\) \{ ::set_\error\(\$\error\: \"read_only_web\"\); \} \$pagedata = Get(\$webob, \"page:\"\ + \$page); \if\ (!\$pagedata) \{ \if\ (create) \{ /* Marked for creation. */\ \$pagedata = \"\"\; \} \else\ \{ \$which = \$page; \$whichweb = \$web; ::set_\error\(\$\error\: \"page_not_found\"\); \$pagedata = Get(\$webob, \"page:\"\ + \$page); \} \} \if\ (!\$action) \{ \$action = \"view\"\; \} /* Check lock. */\ \if\ (\$udat.\"miki:lock\"\) \{ /* There's a lock. Unlock it. */\ \object\ web; \string\ page; web = \$udat.\"miki:lockweb\"\; page = \$udat.\"miki:lock\"\; \if\ (Get(web, \"lock:\"\ + page) == \$uname) \{ Set(web, \"lock:\"\ + page, 
il\); Set(web, \"lock-stamp:\"\ + page, 
il\); \$udat.\"miki:lockweb\"\ = 
il\; \$udat.\"miki:lock\"\ = 
il\; \} \} \if\ (\$action == \"edit\"\ \&\& !\$confirm_edit) \{ /* Check if the page is currently locked. */\ \string\ lock; \int\ locked_when; lock = Get(\$webob, \"lock:\"\ + \$page); locked_when = \Int\(Get(\$webob, \"lock-stamp:\"\ + \$page)); \if\ (lock \&\& locked_when + 86400 \> 	ime\() \&\& lock != \$uname) \{ \$action = \"edit-locked\"\; \$lockedby = lock; \$lockedwhen = short_	ime\(locked_when); \} \else\ \{ /* Page is not locked. Lock it. */\ Set(\$webob, \"lock:\"\ + \$page, \$uname); Set(\$webob, \"lock-stamp:\"\ + \$page, 	ime\()); \$udat.\"miki:lockweb\"\ = \$webob; \$udat.\"miki:lock\"\ = \$page; \} \} \$jsinit = Get(this, \"jsinit:\"\ + \$action); \if\ (!\$jsinit) \$jsinit = \"function init_page() \{\}\"\; \$headextra = Get(this, \"head:\"\ + \$action); \$(miki-location) = \$server + \" \→ \"\ + \$web + \" \→ \"\ + replace_strings(\$page, \"_\"\, \" \"\); \$(miki-wrapation) = \$server + \" \→ [\"\ + \$web + \".index_\|\"\ + \$web + \"] \→ \<span class='quickgoto' onclick='javascript:quickgoto(this)'\>\"\ + replace_strings(\$page, \"_\"\, \" \"\) + \"\</span\>\"\; \if\ (\$action == \"view\"\ \|\| \$action == \"diffs\"\) \{ \$(mikipage-rev) = \Int\(Get(\$webob, \"rev:\"\ + \$page)); \$(mikipage-diff) = Get(\$webob, \"diff:\"\ + \$page + \":\"\ + \$(mikipage-rev)); \$(mikipage-diffx) = \sizeof\(Arr(\$(mikipage-diff))); \if\ (\$(mikipage-diffx) \> 2) \{ \$(mikipage-author) = \$(mikipage-diff)[\$(mikipage-diffx)-1]; \$(mikipage-stamp) = \$(mikipage-diff)[\$(mikipage-diffx)-2]; \if\ (	ypeof\(\$(mikipage-stamp)) == T_\INT\) \$(mikipage-date) = short_	ime\(\$(mikipage-stamp)); \$(mikipage-author) = \"[main.user_\"\ + \$(mikipage-author) + \"\|\"\ + \$(mikipage-author) + \"]\"\; \} \else\ \{ \$(mikipage-author) = \"nobody\"\; \$(mikipage-stamp) = 0; \$(mikipage-date) = \"sometime\"\; \} \} " \}), 1134012142, "tunk_bodin" \})

il\; \} \} \if\ (\$action == \"edit\"\ \&\& !\$confirm_edit) \{ /* Check if the page is currently locked. */\ \string\ lock; \int\ locked_when; lock = Get(\$webob, \"lock:\"\ + \$page); locked_when = \Int\(Get(\$webob, \"lock-stamp:\"\ + \$page)); \if\ (lock \&\& locked_when + 86400 \> 	ime\() \&\& lock != \$uname) \{ \$action = \"edit-locked\"\; \$lockedby = lock; \$lockedwhen = short_	ime\(locked_when); \} \else\ \{ /* Page is not locked. Lock it. */\ Set(\$webob, \"lock:\"\ + \$page, \$uname); Set(\$webob, \"lock-stamp:\"\ + \$page, 	ime\()); \$udat.\"miki:lockweb\"\ = \$webob; \$udat.\"miki:lock\"\ = \$page; \} \} \$jsinit = Get(this, \"jsinit:\"\ + \$action); \if\ (!\$jsinit) \$jsinit = \"function init_page() \{\}\"\; \$headextra = Get(this, \"head:\"\ + \$action); \$(miki-location) = \$server + \" \→ \"\ + \$web + \" \→ \"\ + replace_strings(\$page, \"_\"\, \" \"\); \$(miki-wrapation) = \$server + \" \→ [\"\ + \$web + \".index_\|\"\ + \$web + \"] \→ \<span class='quickgoto' onclick='javascript:quickgoto(this)'\>\"\ + replace_strings(\$page, \"_\"\, \" \"\) + \"\</span\>\"\; \if\ (\$action == \"view\"\ \|\| \$action == \"diffs\"\) \{ \$(mikipage-rev) = \Int\(Get(\$webob, \"rev:\"\ + \$page)); \$(mikipage-diff) = Get(\$webob, \"diff:\"\ + \$page + \":\"\ + \$(mikipage-rev)); \$(mikipage-diffx) = \sizeof\(Arr(\$(mikipage-diff))); \if\ (\$(mikipage-diffx) \> 2) \{ \$(mikipage-author) = \$(mikipage-diff)[\$(mikipage-diffx)-1]; \$(mikipage-stamp) = \$(mikipage-diff)[\$(mikipage-diffx)-2]; \if\ (	ypeof\(\$(mikipage-stamp)) == T_\INT\) \$(mikipage-date) = short_	ime\(\$(mikipage-stamp)); \$(mikipage-author) = \"[main.user_\"\ + \$(mikipage-author) + \"\|\"\ + \$(mikipage-author) + \"]\"\; \} \else\ \{ \$(mikipage-author) = \"nobody\"\; \$(mikipage-stamp) = 0; \$(mikipage-date) = \"sometime\"\; \} \} " \}), 1134012158, "tunk_bodin" \})

(\{ (\{ "-\X[S] ", "+\ \<Core:Property property=\"export:page:bugs_and_issues_in_miki\"\>", "- int\ create; \$(miki-web-folder) = this.\"config:miki-web-folder\"\; \$server = \$\{Data:info\}.server; create = FALSE; \if\ (!\$web) \{ \$web = \"main\"\; \$page = \"index_\"\; \} \if\ (!\$page) \{ \$page = \"index_\"\; \} \if\ (\$action == \"create\"\) \{ /* Special case; we need to resolve the page here, and possibly even change the web. */\ \$page = replace_strings(\$page, \"!-USC!\"\, \"_\"\); \if\ (contains(\$page, \".\"\)) \{ /* Got a web reference. */\ \string\ *s; s = \explode\(\$page, \".\"\); \$web = s[0]; \$page = s[1]; \} /* Flag creation. */\ create = TRUE; /* And set action to edit. */\ \$action = \"edit\"\; \} \$webob = Obj(\$(miki-web-folder) + \$web); \if\ (\$webob.\"web-is\"\) \$webob = \$webob.\"web-is\"\; \if\ (!\$webob) \{ ::set_\error\(\$\error\: \"web_not_found\"\); \} \if\ (!contains(\$page, \"_\"\)) \$page = \$page + \"_\"\; \if\ (\$action == \"edit\"\ \&\& \$webob.\"web-readonly\"\) \{ ::set_\error\(\$\error\: \"read_only_web\"\); \} \$pagedata = Get(\$webob, \"page:\"\ + \$page); \if\ (!\$pagedata) \{ \if\ (create) \{ /* Marked for creation. */\ \$pagedata = \"\"\; \} \else\ \{ \$which = \$page; \$whichweb = \$web; ::set_\error\(\$\error\: \"page_not_found\"\); \$pagedata = Get(\$webob, \"page:\"\ + \$page); \} \} \if\ (!\$action) \{ \$action = \"view\"\; \} /* Check lock. */\ \if\ (\$udat.\"miki:lock\"\) \{ /* There's a lock. Unlock it. */\ \object\ web; \string\ page; web = \$udat.\"miki:lockweb\"\; page = \$udat.\"miki:lock\"\; \if\ (Get(web, \"lock:\"\ + page) == \$uname) \{ Set(web, \"lock:\"\ + page, 
il\); Set(web, \"lock-stamp:\"\ + page, 
il\); \$udat.\"miki:lockweb\"\ = 
il\; \$udat.\"miki:lock\"\ = 
il\; \} \} \if\ (\$action == \"edit\"\ \&\& !\$confirm_edit) \{ /* Check if the page is currently locked. */\ \string\ lock; \int\ locked_when; lock = Get(\$webob, \"lock:\"\ + \$page); locked_when = \Int\(Get(\$webob, \"lock-stamp:\"\ + \$page)); \if\ (lock \&\& locked_when + 86400 \> 	ime\() \&\& lock != \$uname) \{ \$action = \"edit-locked\"\; \$lockedby = lock; \$lockedwhen = short_	ime\(locked_when); \} \else\ \{ /* Page is not locked. Lock it. */\ Set(\$webob, \"lock:\"\ + \$page, \$uname); Set(\$webob, \"lock-stamp:\"\ + \$page, 	ime\()); \$udat.\"miki:lockweb\"\ = \$webob; \$udat.\"miki:lock\"\ = \$page; \} \} \$jsinit = Get(this, \"jsinit:\"\ + \$action); \if\ (!\$jsinit) \$jsinit = \"function init_page() \{\}\"\; \$headextra = Get(this, \"head:\"\ + \$action); \$(miki-location) = \$server + \" \→ \"\ + \$web + \" \→ \"\ + replace_strings(\$page, \"_\"\, \" \"\); \$(miki-wrapation) = \$server + \" \→ [\"\ + \$web + \".index_\|\"\ + \$web + \"] \→ \<span class='quickgoto' onclick='javascript:quickgoto(this)'\>\"\ + replace_strings(\$page, \"_\"\, \" \"\) + \"\</span\>\"\; \if\ (\$action == \"view\"\ \|\| \$action == \"diffs\"\) \{ \$(mikipage-rev) = \Int\(Get(\$webob, \"rev:\"\ + \$page)); \$(mikipage-diff) = Get(\$webob, \"diff:\"\ + \$page + \":\"\ + \$(mikipage-rev)); \$(mikipage-diffx) = \sizeof\(Arr(\$(mikipage-diff))); \if\ (\$(mikipage-diffx) \> 2) \{ \$(mikipage-author) = \$(mikipage-diff)[\$(mikipage-diffx)-1]; \$(mikipage-stamp) = \$(mikipage-diff)[\$(mikipage-diffx)-2]; \if\ (	ypeof\(\$(mikipage-stamp)) == T_\INT\) \$(mikipage-date) = short_	ime\(\$(mikipage-stamp)); \$(mikipage-author) = \"[main.user_\"\ + \$(mikipage-author) + \"\|\"\ + \$(mikipage-author) + \"]\"\; \} \else\ \{ \$(mikipage-author) = \"nobody\"\; \$(mikipage-stamp) = 0; \$(mikipage-date) = \"sometime\"\; \} \} ", "+ \ \ \ \ \"\\\<h1\\\>Bugs and issues in MIki\\\</h1\\\>\\\\r\\\\n\\\<sbr/\\\>\\\\r\\\\nThis page contains a list of currently known bugs and issues in MIki.\\\\r\\\\nPlease do not edit this page, but \\\<a\\\\r\\\\nhref=\\\\\"mailto:kalle@mortalis.skotos.net\\\\\"\\\>send me an email\\\</a\\\>\\\\r\\\\ninstead. This is for information purposes only.\\\<sbr/\\\>\\\\r\\\\n\\\<sbr/\\\>\\\\r\\\\n\\\<span style=\\\\\"font-weight: bold;\\\\\"\\\>Bugs:\\\</span\\\>\\\<sbr/\\\>\\\\r\\\\n\\\<ul\\\>\\\\r\\\\n\ \\\<li\\\>...\\\</li\\\>\\\\r\\\\n\\\</ul\\\>\\\\r\\\\n\\\<span style=\\\\\"font-weight: bold;\\\\\"\\\>Issues:\\\<sbr/\\\>\\\\r\\\\n\\\</span\\\>\\\\r\\\\n\\\<ul\\\>\\\\r\\\\n\ \\\<li\\\>No revision control.\\\</li\\\>\\\\r\\\\n\ \\\<li\\\>Interface needs a prettification.\\\</li\\\>\\\\r\\\\n\ \\\<li\\\>\\\<sbr/\\\>\\\\r\\\\n\ \\\</li\\\>\\\\r\\\\n\\\</ul\\\>\\\\r\\\\n\"", "+ \ \</Core:Property\>", "+ \ " \}), 1134012289, "tunk_bodin" \})

(\{ (\{ "-\Test page", "+#!/usr/local/bin/perl use CGI ':standard'; print header; print start_html('A Simple Example'), h1('A Simple Example'), start_form, \\"What's your name? \\",textfield('name'), p, \\"What's the combination?\\", p, checkbox_group(-name=\>'words', \\t\\t -values=\>['eenie','meenie','minie','moe'], \\t\\t -defaults=\>['eenie','minie']), p, \\"What's your favorite color? \\", popup_menu(-name=\>'color', \\t -values=\>['red','green','blue','chartreuse']), p, submit, end_form, hr; if (param()) \{ print \\t\\"Your name is: \\",em(param('name')), \\tp, \\t\\"The keywords are: \\",em(join(\\", \\",param('words'))), \\tp, \\t\\"Your favorite color is: \\",em(param('color')), \\thr; \} print a(\{href=\>'../cgi_docs.html'\},'Go to the documentation'); print end_html; ", "- \ " \}), 1134021419, "tunk_bodin" \})

(\{ (\{ "-#!/usr/local/bin/perl use CGI ':standard'; print header; print start_html('A Simple Example'), h1('A Simple Example'), start_form, \\"What's your name? \\",textfield('name'), p, \\"What's the combination?\\", p, checkbox_group(-name=\>'words', \\t\\t -values=\>['eenie','meenie','minie','moe'], \\t\\t -defaults=\>['eenie','minie']), p, \\"What's your favorite color? \\", popup_menu(-name=\>'color', \\t -values=\>['red','green','blue','chartreuse']), p, submit, end_form, hr; if (param()) \{ print \\t\\"Your name is: \\",em(param('name')), \\tp, \\t\\"The keywords are: \\",em(join(\\", \\",param('words'))), \\tp, \\t\\"Your favorite color is: \\",em(param('color')), \\thr; \} print a(\{href=\>'../cgi_docs.html'\},'Go to the documentation'); print end_html; ", "+#!/usr/local/bin/perl use CGI qw(:standard :html3); # Some constants to use in our form. @colors=qw/aqua black blue fuschia gray green lime maroon navy olive purple red silver teal white yellow/; @sizes=(\\"\<default\>\\",1..7); # recover the \\"preferences\\" cookie. %preferences = cookie('preferences'); # If the user wants to change the background color or her # name, they will appear among our CGI parameters. foreach ('text','background','name','size') \{ \$preferences\{\$_\} = param(\$_) \|\| \$preferences\{\$_\}; \} # Set some defaults \$preferences\{'background'\} = \$preferences\{'background'\} \|\| 'silver'; \$preferences\{'text'\} = \$preferences\{'text'\} \|\| 'black'; # Refresh the cookie so that it doesn't expire. This also # makes any changes the user made permanent. \$the_cookie = cookie(-name=\>'preferences', \\t\\t\\t -value=\>\\\\%preferences, \\t\\t\\t -expires=\>'+30d'); print header(-cookie=\>\$the_cookie); # Adjust the title to incorporate the user's name, if provided. \$title = \$preferences\{'name'\} ? \\"Welcome back, \$preferences\{name\}!\\" : \\"Customizable Page\\"; # Create the HTML page. We use several of Netscape's # extended tags to control the background color and the # font size. It's safe to use Netscape features here because # cookies don't work anywhere else anyway. print start_html(-title=\>\$title, \\t\\t -bgcolor=\>\$preferences\{'background'\}, \\t\\t -text=\>\$preferences\{'text'\} \\t\\t ); print basefont(\{SIZE=\>\$preferences\{size\}\}) if \$preferences\{'size'\} \> 0; print h1(\$title),\<\<END; You can change the appearance of this page by submitting the fill-out form below. If you return to this page any time within 30 days, your preferences will be restored. END ; # Create the form print hr(), start_form, \\"Your first name: \\", textfield(-name=\>'name', \\t -default=\>\$preferences\{'name'\}, \\t -size=\>30),br, table( \\t TR( \\t td(\\"Preferred\\"), \\t td(\\"Page color:\\"), \\t td(popup_menu(-name=\>'background', \\t\\t\\t -values=\>\\\\@colors, \\t\\t\\t -default=\>\$preferences\{'background'\}) \\t\\t), \\t ), \\t TR( \\t td(''), \\t td(\\"Text color:\\"), \\t td(popup_menu(-name=\>'text', \\t\\t\\t -values=\>\\\\@colors, \\t\\t\\t -default=\>\$preferences\{'text'\}) \\t\\t) \\t ), \\t TR( \\t td(''), \\t td(\\"Font size:\\"), \\t td(popup_menu(-name=\>'size', \\t\\t\\t -values=\>\\\\@sizes, \\t\\t\\t -default=\>\$preferences\{'size'\}) \\t\\t) \\t ) \\t ), submit(-label=\>'Set preferences'), hr; \\t print a(\{HREF=\>\\"/\\"\},'Go to the home page'); " \}), 1134021582, "tunk_bodin" \})

(\{ (\{ "-#!/usr/local/bin/perl use CGI qw(:standard :html3); # Some constants to use in our form. @colors=qw/aqua black blue fuschia gray green lime maroon navy olive purple red silver teal white yellow/; @sizes=(\\"\<default\>\\",1..7); # recover the \\"preferences\\" cookie. %preferences = cookie('preferences'); # If the user wants to change the background color or her # name, they will appear among our CGI parameters. foreach ('text','background','name','size') \{ \$preferences\{\$_\} = param(\$_) \|\| \$preferences\{\$_\}; \} # Set some defaults \$preferences\{'background'\} = \$preferences\{'background'\} \|\| 'silver'; \$preferences\{'text'\} = \$preferences\{'text'\} \|\| 'black'; # Refresh the cookie so that it doesn't expire. This also # makes any changes the user made permanent. \$the_cookie = cookie(-name=\>'preferences', \\t\\t\\t -value=\>\\\\%preferences, \\t\\t\\t -expires=\>'+30d'); print header(-cookie=\>\$the_cookie); # Adjust the title to incorporate the user's name, if provided. \$title = \$preferences\{'name'\} ? \\"Welcome back, \$preferences\{name\}!\\" : \\"Customizable Page\\"; # Create the HTML page. We use several of Netscape's # extended tags to control the background color and the # font size. It's safe to use Netscape features here because # cookies don't work anywhere else anyway. print start_html(-title=\>\$title, \\t\\t -bgcolor=\>\$preferences\{'background'\}, \\t\\t -text=\>\$preferences\{'text'\} \\t\\t ); print basefont(\{SIZE=\>\$preferences\{size\}\}) if \$preferences\{'size'\} \> 0; print h1(\$title),\<\<END; You can change the appearance of this page by submitting the fill-out form below. If you return to this page any time within 30 days, your preferences will be restored. END ; # Create the form print hr(), start_form, \\"Your first name: \\", textfield(-name=\>'name', \\t -default=\>\$preferences\{'name'\}, \\t -size=\>30),br, table( \\t TR( \\t td(\\"Preferred\\"), \\t td(\\"Page color:\\"), \\t td(popup_menu(-name=\>'background', \\t\\t\\t -values=\>\\\\@colors, \\t\\t\\t -default=\>\$preferences\{'background'\}) \\t\\t), \\t ), \\t TR( \\t td(''), \\t td(\\"Text color:\\"), \\t td(popup_menu(-name=\>'text', \\t\\t\\t -values=\>\\\\@colors, \\t\\t\\t -default=\>\$preferences\{'text'\}) \\t\\t) \\t ), \\t TR( \\t td(''), \\t td(\\"Font size:\\"), \\t td(popup_menu(-name=\>'size', \\t\\t\\t -values=\>\\\\@sizes, \\t\\t\\t -default=\>\$preferences\{'size'\}) \\t\\t) \\t ) \\t ), submit(-label=\>'Set preferences'), hr; \\t print a(\{HREF=\>\\"/\\"\},'Go to the home page'); ", "+# Some constants to use in our form. @colors=qw/aqua black blue fuschia gray green lime maroon navy olive purple red silver teal white yellow/; @sizes=(\\"\<default\>\\",1..7); # recover the \\"preferences\\" cookie. %preferences = cookie('preferences'); # If the user wants to change the background color or her # name, they will appear among our CGI parameters. foreach ('text','background','name','size') \{ \$preferences\{\$_\} = param(\$_) \|\| \$preferences\{\$_\}; \} # Set some defaults \$preferences\{'background'\} = \$preferences\{'background'\} \|\| 'silver'; \$preferences\{'text'\} = \$preferences\{'text'\} \|\| 'black'; # Refresh the cookie so that it doesn't expire. This also # makes any changes the user made permanent. \$the_cookie = cookie(-name=\>'preferences', \\t\\t\\t -value=\>\\\\%preferences, \\t\\t\\t -expires=\>'+30d'); print header(-cookie=\>\$the_cookie); # Adjust the title to incorporate the user's name, if provided. \$title = \$preferences\{'name'\} ? \\"Welcome back, \$preferences\{name\}!\\" : \\"Customizable Page\\"; # Create the HTML page. We use several of Netscape's # extended tags to control the background color and the # font size. It's safe to use Netscape features here because # cookies don't work anywhere else anyway. print start_html(-title=\>\$title, \\t\\t -bgcolor=\>\$preferences\{'background'\}, \\t\\t -text=\>\$preferences\{'text'\} \\t\\t ); print basefont(\{SIZE=\>\$preferences\{size\}\}) if \$preferences\{'size'\} \> 0; print h1(\$title),\<\<END; You can change the appearance of this page by submitting the fill-out form below. If you return to this page any time within 30 days, your preferences will be restored. END ; # Create the form print hr(), start_form, \\"Your first name: \\", textfield(-name=\>'name', \\t -default=\>\$preferences\{'name'\}, \\t -size=\>30),br, table( \\t TR( \\t td(\\"Preferred\\"), \\t td(\\"Page color:\\"), \\t td(popup_menu(-name=\>'background', \\t\\t\\t -values=\>\\\\@colors, \\t\\t\\t -default=\>\$preferences\{'background'\}) \\t\\t), \\t ), \\t TR( \\t td(''), \\t td(\\"Text color:\\"), \\t td(popup_menu(-name=\>'text', \\t\\t\\t -values=\>\\\\@colors, \\t\\t\\t -default=\>\$preferences\{'text'\}) \\t\\t) \\t ), \\t TR( \\t td(''), \\t td(\\"Font size:\\"), \\t td(popup_menu(-name=\>'size', \\t\\t\\t -values=\>\\\\@sizes, \\t\\t\\t -default=\>\$preferences\{'size'\}) \\t\\t) \\t ) \\t ), submit(-label=\>'Set preferences'), hr; \\t print a(\{HREF=\>\\"/\\"\},'Go to the home page'); print end_html; " \}), 1134021639, "tunk_bodin" \})

"if (!\$query-\>param) \{ print \\"\<H1\>Ask your Question\</H1\>\\\\n\\"; print \$query-\>startform(-target=\>'_new'); print \\"What's your name? \\",\$query-\>textfield('name'); print \\"\<P\>What's the combination?\<P\>\\", \$query-\>checkbox_group(-name=\>'words', \\t\\t\\t -values=\>['eenie','meenie','minie','moe'], \\t\\t\\t -defaults=\>['eenie','moe']); print \\"\<P\>What's your favorite color? \\", \$query-\>popup_menu(-name=\>'color', \\t\\t -values=\>['red','green','blue','chartreuse']), \\"\<P\>\\"; print \$query-\>submit; print \$query-\>endform; \} else \{ print \\"\<H1\>And the Answer is...\</H1\>\\\\n\\"; print \\"Your name is \<EM\>\\",\$query-\>param(name),\\"\</EM\>\\\\n\\"; print \\"\<P\>The keywords are: \<EM\>\\",join(\\", \\",\$query-\>param(words)),\\"\</EM\>\\\\n\\"; print \\"\<P\>Your favorite color is \<EM\>\\",\$query-\>param(color),\\"\</EM\>\\\\n\\"; \} "
